chunk:
Atlantis Skincare Velvet Skin Serum (2020 formulation)

Brand: Atlantis Skincare

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Oryza sativa (Rice bran) oil, Rosa rubiginosa (Rosehip seed) oil, Triticum vulgare (Wheat germ) oil, Juglans regia (walnut) oil, Argania spinosa (Argan) oil, Persea gratissima (Avocado) oil, Solanum Lycopersicum (To

num Lycopersicum (Tomato) seed oil, Cucumis sativus (Cucumber) seed oil, Camellia seed oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) oil, vitamin E, Nigella sativa (Black cumin) extract, Coffea (Coffee) extract, fragrance (essential oil mix)

Directions: Can be used as a treatment, or as your daily moisturizer morning and/or evening. Apply on cleansed

. Apply on cleansed skin morning and/or evening. During the hotter summer months it can be used as an after sun treatment. We recommend exfoliating your skin once or twice a week to achieve best results

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
